summary: I BELIEVE I HAVE BEEN A VICTIM OF ODOMETER FRAUD. I PURCHASED MY 2004 FORD ESCAPE XLT FROM FIRST CHOICE RENTAL CARS & SALES 3517 OLD PETERSBURG RD MARTINEZ GA 30907. I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE FOR $4700 IN CASH. I RECENTLY FOUND OUT THROUGH CARFAX THAT I AM THE 4TH OWNER AND THE ODOMETER WAS PREVIOUSLY AT  186,475. MY CAR ODOMETER IS CURRENTLY READING AT 147,355 AND COUNTING BECAUSE I DRIVE THIS CAR DAILY. WHEN I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE THE BILL OF SALE DID NOT HAVE THE MILEAGE ON IT, THE BILL STATED EXEMPT. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW CAN I GET MY MONEY BACK FOR THE VEHICLE, BECAUSE I WOULD HAVE NEVER BOUGHT THIS VEHICLE IF I WOULD HAVE KNOW THE ODOMETER HAD BEEN ROLLED BACK.
